forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. Low around 40, with temperatures rising to around 56 overnight. South southwest wind around 13 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.shortForecast: Rain Showers then Rain And Snow Showers Likely
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers before 2pm, then rain and snow showers likely. Mostly cloudy. High near 47, with temperatures falling to around 36 in the afternoon. West wind 12 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Thursday Night
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Snow Showers then Partly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow showers before 7pm. Partly cloudy, with a low around 28. West northwest wind 6 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 53. Southwest wind 5 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph.

sections.header: Stony Creek Cross Country Ski Rental:
sections.content: Cross Country Ski center closed for the season.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: It’s still great! New groom this morning over a strong base with fresh snow . The upper loops have great coverage : both the skate and classic are premium .

nubsNob.xcTrails: The upper trails were power-tilled and tracked on Monday. Expect soft snow today. The upper red is holding snow better compared to the rest of the trails.
nubsNob.comments: Spring skiing continues at Nub's Nob. The snow is granular in texture today and has some set to it in certain areas. The snow should loosen up quickly this morning as the temperature goes up. A rain and snow mix is expected late this afternoon and evening. The Tune Center is now selling the demo skis from this season and we have some amazing deals in the General Store. The lifts will spin from 9 AM to 4:30 PM. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
